title: Apsara Diamond Haaram with Emerald Accents - COHAR00030
materials: adorned with brilliant-cut diamonds. Features three captivating Emeralds with a notable green hue and good clarity. The diamonds are meticulously set in a prong setting. Finished with our signature Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a delicate peacock (Mayura) motif design interspersed with floral patterns, all intricately studded with diamonds. The central emeralds add a striking focal point. The design is reminiscent of traditional South Indian temple jewelry, offering a modern twist with a lighter, more wearable feel.
colors: and deep Green Emeralds create a harmonious and luxurious color palette.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Equally suitable for modern formal events seeking a touch of South Indian elegance. Ideal for Muhurtham and Seemantham ceremonies.
description: This Apsara Diamond Haaram seamlessly blends traditional South Indian design with modern sensibilities. The intricate peacock detailing, coupled with the vibrant emeralds, makes it a truly unique and eye-catching piece. The impeccable craftsmanship and high-quality materials ensure lasting beauty and value, making it a cherished heirloom (వారసత్వ సంపద). Its timeless elegance makes it a statement piece for any occasion.
